instructions: This is a character sheet for David Petersen and Luke Crane's Mouse Guard Roleplaying Game, second edition. This character sheet has a second page for Skills and Wises which you can access by pressing the Scroll & Sword icon in the upper right of the sheet. If you have questions or suggestions you can contact me via personal message from my [Roll20 Profile](https://app.roll20.net/users/23472/richard-t) *Version* '1.1'- Expanded skill list to 24 (from 16), added a new input for current Nature.- Added a translation file *Version* `1.0`
